categories: Category:Commission for the Preservation of the New Order personnel

nodes.text: Chrigeld Tinnine was a male artist based on the planet Alderaan who volunteered his art to the Galactic Empire's Commission for the Preservation of the New Order including the propaganda poster Report Sedition, which encouraged Imperial citizens to report suspicious activity or individuals in their neighborhoods. The poster was altered before its distribution, with the emblem of the Galactic Republic used in graffiti in the poster being swapped out for the Separatist hex icon. Ultimately, Tinnine was pushed out by younger artists and retired back to Alderaan, where he was killed by the Empire when they destroyed the planet in 0 BBY.
Chrigeld Tinnine was first mentioned in the reference book Star Wars Propaganda: A History of Persuasive Art in the Galaxy, which was written by Pablo Hidalgo and released on October 25, 2016.
